meanings.sent1: The caterpillar had a setaceous body, with tiny bristles covering its back.
meanings.sent2: The setaceous plant had sharp bristles along its stems for protection.
meanings.sent3: The setaceous cactus seemed to be trying to give hugs with its prickly bristles.
meanings.sent4: The setaceous fence looked like a fortress of sharp spears, keeping intruders out.
meanings.sent5: The setaceous texture of the fabric felt like a rough brush against the skin.

meanings.sent1: The artist created a setaceous painting, using thick brush strokes to mimic bristles.
meanings.sent2: The setaceous sculpture was so lifelike, it appeared to have real bristles.
meanings.sent3: The setaceous clouds in the sky looked like giant fluffy brushes floating above.
meanings.sent4: Her setaceous hair stood on end, resembling a wild, untamed bush.
meanings.sent5: The setaceous pattern on the wallpaper made the room feel like a cozy forest.

meanings.definition: Covered with bristles or bristle-like structures.
meanings.sent1: The setaceous cat's fur was so dense that it felt like petting a soft brush.
meanings.sent2: The setaceous surface of the fruit was rough to the touch due to the tiny bristles.
meanings.sent3: The setaceous tree branches swayed in the wind, looking like they were dancing with bristles.
meanings.sent4: The setaceous carpet in the hallway felt like walking on a field of soft spikes.
meanings.sent5: The setaceous texture of the rock made it seem like a natural scrubbing brush.
